effect.shortEffect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.
effect.full: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.

description.diamond-pearl: Inflicts damage on foes using any draining move.
description.platinum: Inflicts damage on foes using any draining move.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts damage on foes using any draining move.
description.black-white: Damages attackers using any draining move.
description.black-2-white-2: Damages attackers using any draining move.
description.x-y: Damages attackers using any draining move.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Damages attackers using any draining move.
description.sun-moon: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
description.sword-shield: The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
